displayProperties.name: Explosive Payload
displayProperties.description: Projectiles create an area-of-effect detonation on impact. Improves range.

displayProperties.name: Vanishing Step
displayProperties.description: Dodging makes you invisible.

displayProperties.name: Solar Damage Resistance
displayProperties.description: Reduces incoming Solar damage from combatants.

displayProperties.name: Snapshot Sights
displayProperties.description: Faster time to aim down sights. Stability is increased.

displayProperties.name: Psychohack
displayProperties.description: Sustained damage from this weapon lowers the target's damage output for a short duration.

displayProperties.name: Heating Up
displayProperties.description: Final blows with this weapon increase accuracy and stability while improving vertical recoil for a longer duration.

displayProperties.name: Echo of Persistence
displayProperties.description: Void buffs applied to you (Invisibility, Overshield, and Devour) have increased duration.

displayProperties.name: The Game is Afoot!
displayProperties.description: Follow the clue trail and see where it leads.

displayProperties.name: Steady Hands
displayProperties.description: Kills provide improved handling for all weapons for a short duration.

displayProperties.name: Suppression Mastery
displayProperties.description: Suppression effects you create have increased duration.

displayProperties.name: High-Impact Reserves
displayProperties.description: Rounds at the end of the magazine deal more damage. Improved damage starts earlier in the magazine.

displayProperties.name: Ensemble
displayProperties.description: Substantially improved handling and reload speed when allies are nearby.

displayProperties.name: Zen Moment
displayProperties.description: Causing damage with this weapon increases its stability. Improves base stability.

displayProperties.name: Whirlwind Blade
displayProperties.description: Rapid Sword strikes increase this weapon's damage for an improved duration. Guarding ends the effect.

displayProperties.name: Sympathetic Arsenal
displayProperties.description: Reloading a short time after a final blow also reloads stowed weapons.

displayProperties.name: Elemental Capacitor
displayProperties.description:
Substantially increased stats based on the currently equipped subclass.
• [Solar] increases your reload speed.
• [Arc] increases handling.
• [Void] increases stability.
• [Stasis] moderately controls recoil and increases movement speed when aiming down sights.

displayProperties.name: Disruption Break
displayProperties.description: Breaking a combatant's shield with this weapon makes them more vulnerable to Kinetic damage for an improved duration.

displayProperties.name: Adaptive Munitions
displayProperties.description: This weapon adapts its damage output and effectiveness against energy shields that don't match the weapon's damage type.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Bastion
displayProperties.description:
Cast your Super to grant Overshield to nearby allies. 

Casting your Barricade grants Overshield to yourself and nearby allies and empowers it, enabling it to slowly regenerate the Overshield of allies bunkering behind it and extend their Overshield duration.

displayProperties.name: Overflow
displayProperties.description: Picking up Special or Heavy ammo loads this weapon even further beyond normal capacity.

displayProperties.name: Box Breathing
displayProperties.description: Aiming this weapon for an improved short period without firing grants bonus range and precision damage that resets after firing or exiting zoom.

displayProperties.name: Recombination
displayProperties.description: Elemental final blows increase the damage of this weapon's next shot. Increases range.

displayProperties.name: Flash Counter
displayProperties.description: Melee blocked immediately after guarding disorients and weakens the attacker. Ammo reserves increased.

displayProperties.name: Rapid Hit
displayProperties.description: Rapid precision hits temporarily increase stability and reload speed substantially.

displayProperties.name: Echo of Leeching
displayProperties.description: Melee final blows start health regeneration for you and nearby allies.

displayProperties.name: Echo of Exchange
displayProperties.description: Melee final blows grant grenade energy.

displayProperties.name: Umbral Sustenance
displayProperties.description: This weapon's magazine is automatically reloaded when you gain Devour, a Void overshield, or become invisible.

displayProperties.name: Surrounded
displayProperties.description: This weapon gains improved bonus damage when three or more targets are in close proximity.

displayProperties.name: Voltaic Mirror
displayProperties.description: Attacks you redirect with your Arc Staff deal massively increased damage.

displayProperties.name: Void Siphon
displayProperties.description: Rapid Void weapon final blows create an Orb of Power.

displayProperties.name: Unstoppable Force
displayProperties.description: Blocking damage with your shield increases projectile damage for a short time.

displayProperties.name: Bottomless Grief
displayProperties.description: Substantially increases magazine size. While you are the last living member of your fireteam, each final blow refills your magazine.

displayProperties.name: Adrenaline Junkie
displayProperties.description: This weapon gains increased damage and handling from final blows with grenades or this weapon for an improved duration.

displayProperties.name: Desperado
displayProperties.description: Reloading after a precision final blow increases your rate of fire for an improved duration.

displayProperties.name: Compounding Force
displayProperties.description: Fires slugs that cause massive damage to combatant shields. Strong against [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions.

displayProperties.name: Dragonfly
displayProperties.description: Precision final blows create an elemental damage explosion. Improves reload.

displayProperties.name: Echo of Expulsion
displayProperties.description: Void ability final blows cause targets to explode.

displayProperties.name: Mulligan
displayProperties.description: Missing a shot has an improved chance to return ammo directly to the magazine.

displayProperties.name: Under Pressure
displayProperties.description: Greatly improved stability and accuracy as the magazine gets lower.

displayProperties.name: Duelist's Trance
displayProperties.description: Sword final blows grant greatly increased charge rate, efficiency, and defense until this weapon is stowed.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Subsistence
displayProperties.description: Defeating targets partially reloads the magazine from reserves with an increased amount of ammo.

displayProperties.name: Multikill Clip
displayProperties.description: Reloading grants increased damage based on the number of rapid final blows made beforehand for an improved duration.

displayProperties.name: Firefly
displayProperties.description: Precision final blows with this weapon substantially increase reload speed and cause the target to explode, dealing Solar damage to nearby targets.

displayProperties.name: Killing Wind
displayProperties.description: Final blows grant increased mobility, weapon range, and handling for an improved duration.

displayProperties.name: Glaive Dexterity
displayProperties.description: Faster ready and stow speed for Glaives.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Hand Cannon Dexterity
displayProperties.description: Faster ready and stow speed for Hand Cannons.

displayProperties.name: Kickstart
displayProperties.description: Gain bonus damage and charge rate during a slide after sprinting for an improved duration.

displayProperties.name: Impulse Amplifier
displayProperties.description: Massively increases projectile velocity, substantially increases reload speed.

displayProperties.name: Glaive Ammo Finder
displayProperties.description: Increases your chances of finding ammo while you have a Glaive equipped.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Eye of the Storm
displayProperties.description: This weapon becomes more accurate and boosts handling as your health gets lower. Increases stability.

displayProperties.name: Perpetual Motion Enhanced
displayProperties.description: This weapon gains bonus stability, handling, and reload speed while the wielder is in motion for a short duration.

displayProperties.name: Celerity
displayProperties.description:
Substantially increases weapon handling and reload speed. Gain the following effects while you are the last living member of your fireteam:
• Increased target acquisition
• Increased handling and reload speed
• Reduced flinch from incoming fire

displayProperties.name: Trench Barrel
displayProperties.description: After a successful melee hit, this weapon gains increased damage, improved handling, and improved reload speed for a short duration—or until three shots are fired.

displayProperties.name: Glaive Scavenger
displayProperties.description: Glaives get bonus reserves when picking up ammo used by that Glaive.

displayProperties.name: Disruption Break
displayProperties.description: Breaking a combatant's shield with this weapon makes them more vulnerable to Kinetic damage for an improved duration.

displayProperties.name: Quickdraw
displayProperties.description: This weapon can be drawn unbelievably fast. Handling is improved.

displayProperties.name: Steady Hands
displayProperties.description: Kills provide improved handling for all weapons for a longer duration.

displayProperties.name: Suppressing Glaive
displayProperties.description: Damaging combatants with your Glaive suppresses them, preventing them from using abilities for a short time.

displayProperties.name: Pulse Monitor
displayProperties.description: Automatically reloads the magazine and improves weapon handling when lightly wounded—even when this weapon is stowed.

displayProperties.name: Overflow
displayProperties.description: Picking up Special or Heavy ammo automatically loads this weapon beyond normal capacity.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Cluster Bomb
displayProperties.description: Rockets spawn cluster bombs upon detonation. Blast radius is increased.

displayProperties.name: Offensive Bulwark
displayProperties.description:
While you have an Overshield or are inside Ward of Dawn, your grenade charges significantly faster, you have increased melee range and damage, and melee final blows extend the duration of your Overshield.

You gain an additional shield throw while in Sentinel Shield.

displayProperties.name: Unstoppable Pulse Rifle
displayProperties.description:
Aiming down Pulse Rifle sights loads a high-impact burst that stuns unshielded combatants.

Strong against [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions.

displayProperties.name: Font of Might
displayProperties.description: Picking up an elemental well that matches your subclass energy type grants a temporary bonus to weapon damage of that same elemental type.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Demolitionist
displayProperties.description: Final blows with this weapon generate an improved amount of grenade energy. Activating your grenade ability reloads this weapon from reserves.

displayProperties.name: Auto-Loading Holster
displayProperties.description: The holstered weapon is automatically reloaded after an improved short period of time.

displayProperties.name: Dual Loader
displayProperties.description: Reloads three shells at a time, but reduces reload speed.

displayProperties.name: Stats for All
displayProperties.description: Hitting three separate targets increases weapon handling, stability, reload, and range for an improved duration.

displayProperties.name: Land Tank
displayProperties.description: Final blows with this weapon grant increased Resilience and additional damage resistance from combatants.

displayProperties.name: Force Multiplier
displayProperties.description: Shotgun final blows consume melee energy to grant an Overshield.

displayProperties.name: Nova Bomb: Vortex
displayProperties.description:
Hurl an explosive bolt of Void Light at a target, disintegrating those caught within its blast.

Nova Bomb creates a singularity that pulls targets inward and continually damages those trapped inside.

displayProperties.name: Nova Warp
displayProperties.description:
Step between dimensions to subvert the laws of physics.
[Super Secondary]  : Teleport a short distance.
[Super Primary]  : Unleash a deadly Void eruption.

displayProperties.name: Nova Bomb: Cataclysm
displayProperties.description:
Hurl an explosive bolt of Void Light at a target, disintegrating those caught within its blast.

Nova Bomb travels slowly and seeks targets. Detonations shatter into smaller seeker projectiles.

displayProperties.name: Edge of Action
displayProperties.description: [Aim Down Sights]  : Raise shield

displayProperties.name: Echo of Starvation
displayProperties.description: Picking up an Orb of Power grants Devour.

displayProperties.name: Tilting at Windmills
displayProperties.description: Blocking damage with your shield increases movement speed until you lower your shield for an improved duration.

displayProperties.name: Kinetic Siphon
displayProperties.description: Rapid Kinetic weapon final blows create an Orb of Power.

displayProperties.name: Edge of Concurrence
displayProperties.description: [Aim Down Sights]  : Raise shield

displayProperties.name: Glaive Reserves
displayProperties.description: Increases the amount of Glaive ammo you can carry.

displayProperties.name: Rewind Rounds
displayProperties.description: When this weapon's magazine is empty, it refills from reserves based on the number of hits. Improves range.

displayProperties.name: Golden Tricorn Enhanced
displayProperties.description: Final blows with this weapon grant bonus damage for an improved duration. While this buff is active, grenade or melee final blows of the same damage type greatly increase its damage for an improved duration.

displayProperties.name: Piercing Bowstring
displayProperties.description:
Bows gain shield-piercing arrows, which bypass combatant defenses.

Strong against [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions.

displayProperties.name: Vanguard Scanner
displayProperties.description: Grants a chance to obtain additional faction consumables in Vanguard Operations.

displayProperties.name: The Extra Mile
displayProperties.description: Completing a clan vendor challenge awards an additional 5 Legendary shards.

displayProperties.name: UNLOCKED BY QUEST
displayProperties.description: After owning at least 1 Stasis Aspect, unlock this Fragment by exchanging a Memory Fragment with the Exo Stranger on Europa. Earn Memory Fragments through completing the Exo Stranger's Fragment quests.

displayProperties.name: Triple Tap
displayProperties.description: Rapidly landing precision hits will return one round to the magazine.

displayProperties.name: Starless Night
displayProperties.description: Ward of Dawn blinds targets and grants Void overshield. Guarding blinds.

displayProperties.name: Liquid Cooling
displayProperties.description: Direct hits by a charged shot instantly freeze the target. Indirect hits freeze combatants and slow opposing Guardians.

displayProperties.name: Vanguard Operations Experience Log
displayProperties.description: Gain 10% more XP while in Vanguard Operations.

displayProperties.name: Thin the Herd
displayProperties.description: Direct hits do more damage to combatant shields. Dealing damage increases reload speed. Rapid final blows against grenade-damaged combatants refill the magazine.

displayProperties.name: Adrenaline Junkie
displayProperties.description: This weapon gains increased damage and handling from final blows with grenades or this weapon.
Find Lure Mutation mods as extra rewards when completing activities for 24 hours.
displayProperties.name: Lure Mutation Finder
